Geothermal power plant.Description: A geothermal power plant utilizes geothermal energy to generate electricity.
A geothermal power plant uses a heat exchanger to transfer heat from the geothermal fluid to the working fluid.
A geothermal power plant extracts hot water or steam from a geothermal reservoir to generate electricity.
